plays.text: Goal scored by Eric Belanger assisted by Dustin Brown AND Tom Kostopoulos
Penalty to Sergei Fedorov 2 minutes for Tripping Tim Gleason

Penalty to Sergei Fedorov 2 minutes for Hooking Eric Belanger
Goal scored by Tim Gleason assisted by Derek Armstrong AND Alexander Frolov
Goal scored by Trevor Letowski assisted by Ron Hainsey AND Luke Richardson
Penalty to Duvie Westcott 2 minutes for Holding(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Jeff Cowan 2 minutes for Roughing Ben Simon
Penalty to George Parros 2 minutes for High Sticking Nikolai Zherdev
Goal scored by Jaroslav Balastik assisted by Duvie Westcott AND David Vyborny
Penalty to Pavol Demitra 2 minutes for Interference(opposing player not identified)
Goal scored by Jason Chimera assisted by Manny Malhotra AND Adam Foote
Penalty to Tom Kostopoulos 2 minutes for Crosschecking Manny Malhotra
Goal scored by David Vyborny assisted by Ron Hainsey AND Jaroslav Balastik
Goal scored by Sergei Fedorov assisted by Rick Nash
Goal scored by Derek Armstrong assisted by Michael Cammalleri
Goal scored by Jason Chimera unassisted
Penalty to Derek Armstrong 2 minutes for Holding(opposing player not identified)
